title: "Qualcomm Plants 5G Modem in Chips for Cheap Smartphones"
excerpt: "The Snapdragon 690 chip contains the X51 modem, which supports data rates of 2.5 Gbps and upload speeds of 660 Mbps. The chip can connect to 5G networks in any part of the world, but it lacks the ability to access the fastest millimeter wave frequencies."
